attributes.action: we at street vibe Events want to get a abandoned building to help homeless
attributes.additional_details: we will not stop helping others and bringing community’s together we will not give up on the less fortunate help us get a building for us to work in there's so many buildings closed down what we can change lives in join us
attributes.background: we help the homeless twice a week with hot food clothing and much more we also do events to bring community's together we want a building for the homeless to come to for activities and maths and English and much more

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament can't help you to get an abandoned building in your local area. You could talk to a local councillor about this. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
